text: Ni we wabaremye abakomoye mu gitaka, hanyuma mu ntanga, hanyuma mu rusoro rwâ€™amaraso, hanyuma abasohora muri (nyababyeyi) muri impinja, hanyuma arabakuza muba ibikwerere, hanyuma muba abasaza. No muri mwe harimo abapfa mbere, (Allah abikora gutyo) kugira ngo (mubeho kugeza) ku gihe cyagenwe, ngo wenda mwagira ubwenge
